Spring Clean – Sunday 18 May

Please note new time – 10am to 2pm – we’re aiming to keep it short-ish and sweet… to enable Janny Joe to enjoy some of his Sunday in peace!

Parent Council Fundraising

Over the last couple of years the focus of Parent Council fundraising has been on Playground Improvements. Working alongside then Deputy Head Fiona Kerr, we were investigating the possibility of matched funding from Legacy (Commonwealth Games) grants to allow us to undertake a more major project, such as a new pitch. Spring Clean

Sunday 18th May 10am – 4pm It’s that time of year again. Our fabulous garden organisers have a list of tasks they need help with and the playground has some new and exciting projects which need willing volunteers. Donate to Parent Council

In response to requests for the ability to make donations to the Parent Council funds outwith events, we now have a PayPal account to allow parents, carers and wider families to donate towards resources for the school.

  • About

This website is for parents and carers of pupils at Hyndland Primary School and it is run by its Parent Council.

If you’d like to receive e-mail updates, please e-mail us and we can add you to the mailing list.

On the other hand, if you would like to contact the school directly, you can do so by calling them on 0141 339 7207

  • School Twitter

    @HyndlandPS

Website maintained by Hyndland Primary Parent Council & Ali Walker
